publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2647 Kenny MacAskill: Draft International Criminal Court (Remand Time) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft International Criminal Court (Remand Time) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-2647 Kenny MacAskill: Draft International Criminal Court (Remand Time) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft International Criminal Court (Remand Time) Order 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
